column1: Le Grand-Quevilly [lə ɡʁɑ̃ keviji] is a commune in the Seine-Maritime department in the Normandy region in north-western France.
The town is third largest suburb of Rouen
column2: a port with considerable light industry situated just 3 miles (5 kilometres) southwest of the centre of Rouen
column3: at the junction of the D 3
